content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Louisiana Geographic Information Center (LAGIC)</origin> <pubdate>20020515</pubdate> <title>East Baton Rouge Fire Stations, UTM15 NAD83, LAGIC (2002) [ebr_fire_stations]</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <serinfo> <sername>ebr_fire_stations</sername> <issue>ebr_fire_stations</issue> </serinfo> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Baton Rouge, LA</pubplace> <publish>Louisiana Geographic Information Center (LAGIC)</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://lagic.lsu.edu/metadata/LAGIC/ebr_fire_stations/ebr_fire_stations.htm</onlink> <onlink>http://lagic.lsu.edu/datacatalog/</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> This dataset consists of twenty-nine (29) geocoded points representing fire stations in East Baton Rouge parish, Louisiana.  Thirty (30) fire station, disctrict, and mechanic shop locations were obtained from the East Baton Rouge Fire Department website <URL:http://ci.baton-rouge.la.us/dept/fire/>.  The locations were stored within a database and geocoded to the U.S. Census Bureau's TIGER 2000 roads (UTM zone 15, NAD 1983, meters) file for East Baton Rouge parish. Accuracy of the locations are limited by the TIGER roads file.  One file failed to geocode due lack of physical address, leaving a total of twenty-nine (29) locations (28 fire stations and 1 mechanic shop). </abstract> <purpose>These Fire Station locations for East Baton Rogue parish were geocoded in order to identify their distribution throughout the parish.</purpose> <supplinf>Additional information about these fire stations are available online at <URL:http://ci.baton-rouge.la.us/dept/fire/>.   U.S. Census Bureau files are available online at <URL:http://www.census.gov></supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20020515</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-91.207567</westbc> <eastbc>-90.970099</eastbc> <northbc>30.687907</northbc> <southbc>30.364056</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>Fire Stations</themekey> <themekey>Fire Districts</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>Louisiana</placekey> <placekey>East Baton Rouge</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None.</accconst> <useconst>None.</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Joshua Kent</cntper> <cntorg>Louisiana Geographic Information Center (LAGIC)</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>Data Manager</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>E302 Howe-Russell Geoscience Complex</address> <address>Louisiana State University</address> <city>Baton Rouge</city> <state>Louisiana</state> <postal>70803</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>(225) 578-3476</cntvoice> <cntemail>jkent@lagic.lsu.edu</cntemail> <hours>8 a.m. - 4 p.m.</hours> <cntinst>Email only please.</cntinst> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <datacred>East Baton Rouge parish Fire Department</datacred> <secinfo> <secsys>None</secsys> <secclass>Unclassified</secclass> </secinfo> <native>Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.1 (Build 2600) ; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.1.2.671</native> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>Entity and attribute data were obtained from the Baton Rouge Fire Department website <URL:http://ci.baton-rouge.la.us/dept/fire/>.  Information was submitted into a Microsoft Access Database.</attraccr> <qattracc> <attraccv>100%</attraccv> <attracce>All attributes were assigned as per the website.</attracce> </qattracc> </attracc> <logic>No logical consistency tests were made.</logic> <complete> 29 of the 30 Baton Rouge Fire Department addresses were geocoded to the TIGER 2000 roads file (vector) for East Baton Rouge parish.  The single location failed to be geocoded because it did not contain a physical address (only a P.O. Box).  Geocoding Results are as follows:  > 27 (90%) locations received a score of 75% or higer > 2 (7%) locations received a score of less than 75% > 1 (3%) location was not matched. </complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar> Positional Accuracy is dependent upon the accuracy of the TIGER 2000 roads file for East Baton Rouge Parish.  29 of the 30 Baton Rouge Fire Department addresses were geocoded to the TIGER 2000 roads file (vector) for East Baton Rouge parish.  The single location failed to be geocoded because it did not contain a physical address (only a P.O. Box).  Geocoding Results are as follows:  > 27 (90%) locations received a score of 75% or higer > 2 (7%) locations received a score of less than 75% > 1 (3%) location was not matched. </horizpar> </horizpa>
